name: The Vera Cruz Affair
overview: The player has just been appointed marshal of the logis-chef at the Saint-Etienne (Loire) research brigade. He will have to investigate the death of Vera Cruz, a beautiful young woman who died in October 1985 at the residence of Forez; near the corpse, a letter with these few words: "Adieu. I have had enough of this shabby life. Vera ”. Suicide or masked crime? Investigations begin ...
